mapper.insert: insert into w_purchaseproduction (purchasecode, productioncode, quantity) values (#{purchaseCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{productionCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{quantity, jdbcType = NUMERIC})
mapper.delete: delete from w_purchaseproduction where purchasecode = #{purchaseCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select op.*, m.materialtext productiontext from w_purchaseproduction op left join w_material m on op.productioncode = m.materialcode where op.purchasecode = #{purchaseCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
